title: Online registration
content: Should we apply this now? Or after kcet?

comments.body: Isn't pessat removed for this year?
Idk this is sent by our clg....
"PESU will only take KCET and JEE main scores" so are they still holding PESSAT just for shits and giggles??
And we have to pay like 1200
It's for programs other than B Tech
Nah ...some of my classmates have applied in cyber without knowing abt it...its official by pes
its not there for btech, other courses will still use it. they said its not there for btech in this
Thought it got cancelled? I got in for BBA today without it
